chapter.title: &C2; Development
chapter.subtitle: Contributing to &C2;
chapter.para: This chapter contains information for &C2; developers.

section.title: Stable release procedure
section.para: Each &C2; release should be performed according to the following procedure:

formalpara.title: Review of static code analysis reports
formalpara.para:
Review and fix reasonably-looking flaws from the following reports:
FindBugs
Code Duplication

formalpara.title: Precondition: successful trunk builds
formalpara.para: The status of the C2HEAD-CORE and C2HEAD-SOURCES builds must be successful.

formalpara.title: Precondition: resolved issues
formalpara.para: All issues related to the software to be released scheduled (fix for) for the release must be resolved.

formalpara.title: Replace the stable branch in SVN
Update version files in the stable branch
Trigger stable branch build
formalpara.para: Go to the C2STABLE-ALL build page and trigger a build. If the build is successful, all distribution files should be available in the download directory.

formalpara.title: Verify the distribution files
formalpara.para: Download, unpack and run each distribution file to make sure there are no obvious release blockers.

formalpara.title: Update version files in trunk
Release notes
formalpara.para: Add a page named release-[version]-notes that lists new features, major bug fixes and improvements introduced in the new release. The page will automatically become linked from all relevant sections of the website (done by an SVN external to etc/version/carrot2.version).

formalpara.title: Release note history
formalpara.para: Add release date and link to the release's JIRA issues on the release-notes page.

formalpara.title: Upload distribution files to SourceForge
formalpara.para: Go to SourceForge release manager, create a new release and upload distribution files.

formalpara.title: Circulate release news
formalpara.para:
If appropriate, circulate release news to:
&C2; mailing lists
SourceForge

formalpara.title: Consider upgrading &C2; dependent projects
formalpara.para: If reasonable, upgrade &C2; dependency in other known projects, such as Apache Solr and Nutch.
